TopicTitle: So much time loading the Game

Articles.Content:
Hi, i'm Assa, i need your help please, I've always played KSP and played with this problem thinking about it was normal, until y noticed all my friends were playing KSP withouth waiting for its gameload like 20 or even 30 mins. I played KSP in 2 Computers, the first one wasn't very good, but it worked nice, withouth lag and with high FPS, right now i am playing in a Computer with high specifications, and my KSP lasts like 20 or 30 minutes to load and i am able to play, when it's loading i check all the temperatures of my system, and everything is nice, (CPU Working at 7%, Ram 30%, Graphics like in a fridge..) I srsly don't understand what happens with KSP and me, I tried moving it to the hard disk where it's installed my OS, but it stills lasting the same time until it loads.

Please i need your help, i love KSP and i wanna play it better, withouth needing so much time to play it. (Inside the game, I play at high FPS and withouth Lag, I srsly wanna know what happens and solve it)

Thank you guys

Assa

PD: I tried with and without mods, but it's still the same

Long load times are usually related to having virtual network adapters loaded/active (such as Hamachi in particular). Please check and disable any unused network adapters. See how that works for you.

Welcome to the forums!
